ctx: intros H1 H2 x y Ha Hxy Hyb.
exceptions.tactic: apply (IVT_Rbar_incr f a b (f x) (f y)).
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : Rbar df : R -> R H1 : forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> is_derive f x (df x) H2 : forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> Rbar_lt x b -> df x > 0 x, y : R Ha : Rbar_lt a x Hxy : x < y Hyb : Rbar_lt y b Unable to unify "{x : R | Rbar_lt a x /\\ Rbar_lt x b /\\ f x = ?M2363}" with "f x < f y".

ctx: intros H1 H2 x y Ha Hxy Hyb.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (a b la lb : Rbar) (y : R), is_lim f a la -> is_lim f b lb -> (forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> match b with | Finite y0 => x < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end -> continuity_pt f x) -> Rbar_lt a b -> Rbar_lt la y /\\ match lb with | Finite y0 => y < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end -> {x : R | Rbar_lt a x /\\ match b with | Finite y0 => x < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end /\\ f x = y} f : R -> R a : Rbar r : R df : R -> R H1 : forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> x < r -> is_derive f x (df x) H2 : forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> x < r -> df x > 0 x, y : R Ha : Rbar_lt a x Hxy : x < y Hyb : y < r Unable to unify "is_linear (fun y : R_AbsRing => scal y (df ?M3268)) /\\ (forall x : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing, is_filter_lim (locally ?M3268) x -> is_domin (locally ?M3268) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing => minus y x) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) ((fun y0 : R_AbsRing => scal y0 (df ?M3268)) (minus y x))))" with "f x < f y".

ctx: intros H1 H2 x y Ha Hxy Hyb.
exceptions.exn: In environment H0, H : forall (f : R -> R) (a b la lb : Rbar) (y : R), is_lim f a la -> is_lim f b lb -> (forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> match b with | Finite y0 => x < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end -> continuity_pt f x) -> Rbar_lt a b -> Rbar_lt la y /\\ match lb with | Finite y0 => y < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end -> {x : R | Rbar_lt a x /\\ match b with | Finite y0 => x < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end /\\ f x = y} f : R -> R a : Rbar r : R df : R -> R H1 : forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> x < r -> is_derive f x (df x) H2 : forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> x < r -> df x > 0 x, y : R Ha : Rbar_lt a x Hxy : x < y Hyb : y < r Unable to unify "Rbar_lt a x" with "f x < f y".

ctx: intros H1 H2 x y Ha Hxy Hyb.

ctx: intros H1 H2 x y Ha Hxy Hyb.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (a b la lb : Rbar) (y : R), is_lim f a la -> is_lim f b lb -> (forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> match b with | Finite y0 => x < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end -> continuity_pt f x) -> Rbar_lt a b -> Rbar_lt la y /\\ match lb with | Finite y0 => y < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end -> {x : R | Rbar_lt a x /\\ match b with | Finite y0 => x < y0 | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end /\\ f x = y} f : R -> R a : Rbar df : R -> R H1 : forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> True -> is_derive f x (df x) H2 : forall x : R, Rbar_lt a x -> True -> df x > 0 x, y : R Ha : Rbar_lt a x Hxy : x < y Unable to unify "is_linear (fun y : R_AbsRing => scal y (df ?M4480)) /\\ (forall x : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing, is_filter_lim (locally ?M4480) x -> is_domin (locally ?M4480) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing => minus y x) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule R_AbsRing => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) ((fun y0 : R_AbsRing => scal y0 (df ?M4480)) (minus y x))))" with "f x < f y".

original: intros H1 H2 x y Ha Hxy Hyb. apply (IVT_Rbar_incr f a b (f x) (f y)). - apply H1. apply Ha. - apply H1. apply Hyb. - intros z Hz1 Hz2. apply is_derive_ext with (df1 := df) in H1. + apply H1. apply Ha. apply Hz1. + intros t Ht. apply Rmin_r. rewrite Rmin_left in Hz1. apply Hz1. - apply Ha. - split. + apply Rlt_le_trans with x. apply Ha. apply Rmin_r. + apply Rlt_le_trans with y. apply Hxy. apply Rmax_l.
